data.name: DuckDuckGo Dark - Violet Theme
data.description:
Makes the site a bit more modern and round. It gives you while surfing on the internet a new experience!

DARK THEME ON DUCKDUCKGO MUST BE CHECKED!

Theme does not work with the https://duckduckgo.com/html websites!

data.name: Dark Comfort for Wikipedia

user.name: R3gi CZ
user.about:
I'm hobby amateur designer from Czech Republic. Here I would like to share UI styles for services I use a lot. I think it's better to share them than just keep them for my personal use. That's all. I hope you'll find them useful.

If you like my work, you can write me some feedback or you can by me a beer ;-)
